text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pas/CodeSystem/PASInformationChangeMode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
changed ChangedPreviously sent information has been changed.
added AddedNew information that was not sent previously.

name: PASInformationChangeMode
title: PAS Information Change Mode Code System
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: The mode by which a piece of information has changed.

concept.definition: Previously sent information has been changed.
New information that was not sent previously.
